cons: Financially struggling institution but so deeply embedded in community

job_title: Medical Laboratory Science in Toppenish, WA
pros: Well designed program, wonderful coworkers, intense 8 hour days, this program makes for a long year, and a long (every)day at that, but is well worth it. It's situated next to Yakima, WA, which is a great city with incredible people. In short, great place to live and a great place to involve yourself in a MLS program.
cons: Could be too intense for some people. very strict rules. expensive (very), tiring and easy to burn-out, getting into the program requires a good GPA and a solid interview, along with a BS in one of several sciences.

review_title: Idealistic but the devil's in the details
pros:
Very supportive environment
Small, tight knit departments
cons:
Departmental communication is a struggle
Upper management not as transparent as would be ideal

review_title: Lack of employee support and loyalty
pros: The community of people and students make Heritage worth it.
cons: But doesn't make up for the lack of support from upper management. After years of commitment and loyalty was pushed out of my position after completing my BA.
